Always carry if you can. The life you save could be your own or someone else’s.

posts.author: CatalystForChange
posts.title: A secret sunlight-dimming experiment in California was shut down after public backlash revealed a broader agenda.

link_metadata.description: California researchers secretly planned a massive solar geoengineering experiment to dim sunlight by spraying seawater aerosols over 3,900 square miles, aiming to cool the planet via marine cloud brightening. The project, fearing backlash, bypassed officials but collapsed amid opposition and regulatory hurdles. This incident highlights the need for transparent governance in geoengineering.
link_metadata.title: Secret Solar Geoengineering Experiment in California Halted Amid Backlash
